body.name: Boon Jewl Silicone Orthodontic Pacifier - Baby Pacifier with Soothing Gem-Shaped Nipples - Comfortable Baby Pacifiers Support Natural Oral Muscular Development- Pink- 4 Count - 3-6 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 31 mins
features: Orthodontic Pacifiers: The Jewl orthodontic pacifier’s unique design uses patents developed by a pediatric dentist for the nipple and shield that focus on natural oral muscular development
Comfortable Baby Pacifier: The patented shield design of this baby soother pacifier allows it to float above the skin to allow more air flow and free jaw movement
Gem-Shaped Nipple: The supportive gem-shaped orthodontic pacifier nipple helps encourage your baby's proper tongue placement for a more comfortable sucking experience
Designed for Comfort: The Jewl baby pacifier's narrow neck at the base of the nipple allows for your baby’s mouth to close more fully

Easy to Clean: These silicone pacifiers are dishwasher and sanitizer safe and come in fun colors at various stages (Newborn/Stage 1 for 0-3 months, Stage 2 for 3-6 months, and Stage 3 for 6-18 months)
body.description: The crown jewel of baby essentials. Jewl is Boon’s patented orthodontic baby pacifier, designed with a pediatric dentist to provide your baby with a truly soothing experience. Jewl pacifiers focus on the type of sucking your baby does when self-soothing, which is different from the suck of a feeding baby. This baby pacifier takes self-soothing to the next level with two different patented designs you’ll only find with Boon. The gem-shaped nipple encourages tiny tongues to stay in the proper place for a comfier suck. And the arced shield of the pacifier is designed to touch less of baby’s sensitive skin for better airflow and free jaw movement. Pacifiers may not be the first of your baby essentials added to a baby registry search, but they’re a baby essential that many parents find themselves scrambling for after the baby has arrived. JEWL features biometric sizing that helps parents know which stage is best for their growing child. Science aside, there’s also a variety of Boon-approved colors to choose from. After all, when your baby’s mastering self-soothing, they might as well look great doing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many repurchases
reviews.reviewText: My kiddo is about a year and a half removed from “pacis” but I am still finding these around the house, in bags, and in cars. We purchased so many of these in both sizes over the years. They were his fav. Toward the end of weaning I took on out his mouth and he pooped another in that he had in his hand. When I took that one he popped one in that was hidden in his other hand. He won that day.It was a good fit and durable. I never questioned safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: looks exactly like the picture and the colors im in love with it can’t wait for my baby to use them when he arrives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter will not take any others! She loves these. Super easy to clean. Durable and I love that they are all silicone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the boon jewl
reviews.reviewText: We love these pacifiers. The only thing I don't like is that the 2 pack of level 3 is very expensive. I don't know if they're harder to make or what, but don't appreciate the price difference. Wish these were available in more stores

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my baby when she was 6months she is 16 months now and still loves it. She also bites down on it when her teeth are coming in and looks still brand new

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality but my baby wouldn't take it
reviews.reviewText: My baby did not like these at all. Every baby is different on things like pacifiers but I was excited to order these since they are supposedly good for teeth development but my son wouldn't suck this pacifier at all. It does have a really thin nipple on it. Had he taken it, I think it would have been a nicer pacifier as it is thick and appears to have good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: So other pacifiers end up getting water in the nipple after you wash them, these do not! They seem way cleaner than the normal ones. My only problem with these is my baby does not like the form of these.. I wish he did because these are obviously better for his teeth. So these are better than the traditional ones if you can get your kid to like the shape!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves these!
reviews.reviewText: We ordered a binky sample box off of our registry and this brand of binky was in there and our son loved it! They are well made and work perfect for his little self :)

A mi bebé de 2 meses le gustaron además de que la limpieza y ergonomía son buenos.Con las 4 piezas te da buen abasto para tener todo el día y en diferentes lugaresEl tamaño es bueno y los colores también

reviews.reviewTitle: Comprslos si no quieres volver a tener chupones rotos
reviews.reviewText: Muy resistentes, te olvidas de chupones rotos y mordidos, los recomiendo ampliamente
Mi bebe lo ama! Además por la forma que tiene se le detiene muy fácil cuando se queda dormido 👌🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Product is advertised as "one-piece" silicone, however upon my daughter deciding to bite the side it became obvious in places it was plastic covered by silicone and is not fit for purpose, once pierced the silicone flakes away easily and could cause choking in a young child.
Me encantaron y a mi bebe tambien ... Ninguno de las demas marcas le habian causado interes
